data.title: THE URTH OF THE NEW SUN
data.meta_description: New York : Tor, 1987 . Octavo, boards. First U.S. edition. Sequel to Wolfe's 4-volume The Book of the New Sun. 1988 Hugo nominee. Anatomy of Wonder 1995 4-510. Barron ed , Fantasy Literature 4A-270. A fine copy in fine dust jacket priced 17.95 on the front flap. #173555
data.text:
Wolfe, Gene. THE URTH OF THE NEW SUN. [New York]: Tor, [1987]. Octavo, boards. First U.S. edition. Sequel to Wolfe's 4-volume "The Book of the New Sun." 1988 Hugo nominee. Anatomy of Wonder (1995) 4-510. Barron (ed), Fantasy Literature 4A-270. A fine copy in fine dust jacket priced $17.95 on the front flap. (#173555).

Price: $75.00
